question: Who is the oldest patient and how old are they?
cypher: MATCH (p:Patient RETURN p.name AS oldest_patient,duration.between(date(p.dob), date()).years AS age ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which physician has billed the least to Cigna
cypher: MATCH (p:Payer)<-[c:COVERED_BY]-(v:Visit)-[t:TREATS]-(phy:Physician) WHERE lower(p.name) = 'cigna' RETURN phy.name AS physician_name, SUM(c.billing_amount) AS total_billed ORDER BY total_billed LIMIT 1
